20110118000032.000|20110118000033.000|CC1|MAN CHASING HER.                
20110118000033.000|20110118000035.000|CC1|SHE WAS CLUTCHING HER           
20110118000035.000|20110118000036.000|CC1|2-YEAR-OLD BOY SCREAMING THE    
20110118000036.000|20110118000038.000|CC1|MAN KILLED THEIR                
20110118000038.000|20110118000039.000|CC1|10-MONTH-OLD BABY DAUGHTER.     
20110118000039.000|20110118000041.000|CC1|PERHAPS WITH A PUNCH THAT

20110118000047.000|20110118000049.000|CC1|>> TODAY, A MEMORIAL IN         
20110118000049.000|20110118000050.000|CC1|FRONT OF THE TINY DUPE
